mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SCHEMA01.COMPANY
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from SCHEMA01.COMPANY
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'ア'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'カ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'サ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'タ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'ナ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'ハ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'マ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'ヤ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'ラ'
where COMPANY_NAME_KANA = 'ワ'
order by company_name asc
